title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
Employers from McDonald's to home builder PulteGroup said staffing pressures caused by hiring challenges and surging Covid-19 cases suppressed growth or cut into operations in the fourth quarter.

Chanel has been raising prices at a faster pace than other luxury brands, analysts say, prompting an outcry from some shoppers and testing their willingness to pay.

Cryptocurrency exchanges are shelling out top dollar to run ads during Sunday's Super Bowl between the Los Angeles Rams and Cincinnati Bengals.

Spotify's CEO apologized to employees for the backlash that has followed the emergence of Joe Rogan's use of a racial slur in previous podcast episodes.

What's News: Business & Finance
